messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Jing what is the shortest path to Ming? Starting from Jing, please list the scholar names in order, including Jing, separated by commas.

First, I will identify the connections starting from Jing. Jing is connected to Raj, Wim, Reza, and Pam.

Next, I will check each of these connections to see if any of them are directly connected to Ming. None of them are directly connected to Ming.

Then I will check the connections of Raj, Wim, Reza, and Pam. Raj is connected to Wei. Wim has no further connections. Reza is connected to Wei. Pam is connected to Kim and Ian.

Next, I will check the connections of Wei, Kim, and Ian. Wei is connected to Eva. Kim has no further connections. Ian is connected to Puja.

Then, I will check the connections of Eva and Puja. Eva is connected to Matt and Amy. Puja is connected to Pari.

Next, I will check the connections of Matt, Amy, and Pari. Matt is connected to Zack. Amy is connected to Prem. Pari has no further connections.

Then, I will check the connections of Zack and Prem. Zack is connected to Ming. Prem is connected to Ming.

So, the shortest path from Jing to Ming is: Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, Matt, Zack, Ming.

Answer: Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, Matt, Zack, Ming.

expected_answer: Answer: Jing, Amir, Wei, Eva, Ming
Answer: Jing, Wim, Wei, Eva, Ming
Answer: Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, Ming
Answer: Jing, Nisha, Wei, Eva, Ming
Answer: Jing, Reza, Wei, Eva, Ming
nstepPath.parsed_response: Answer: Jing, Raj, Wei, Eva, Matt, Zack, Ming
